org.jetel.component.aggregate

Class AggregateMappingParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.aggregate.AggregateMappingParser

  • public class AggregateMappingParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses the aggregation mapping.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AggregateMappingParser

        public AggregateMappingParser(java.lang.String mapping,
                      boolean paramsAllowed,
                      boolean lenient,
                      RecordKey recordKey,
                      FunctionRegistry registry,
                      DataRecordMetadata inMetadata,
                      DataRecordMetadata outMetadata)
                       throws AggregationException
        Allocates a new AggregateMappingParser object.
        Parameters:
        mapping - aggregation mapping.
        paramsAllowed - specifies whether graph parameters can be used in the mapping.
        lenient - specifies whether some errors should be treated leniently, i.e. they are logged (so the error message is available later) and the invalid mapping is skipped.
        recordKey - aggregation key.
        registry - aggregation function registry.
        inMetadata - input metadata.
        outMetadata - output metadata.
        Throws:
        AggregationException

    • Method Detail

      • getErrors

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getErrors()
        Returns:
        error messages generated in the lenient mode.

      • isValidConstant

        public static boolean isValidConstant(java.lang.String text)
        Checks if a text has a valid format for a mapping constant.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
        true if the text has a valid format for a mapping constant, false otherwise.

      • getConstantValue

        public static java.lang.Object getConstantValue(java.lang.String text)
                                         throws AggregationException
        Creates the value of a constant.
        Parameters:
        text - text of the constant.
        Returns:
        value of the constant.
        Throws:
        AggregationException - if the constant format is invalid.
